item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 27, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Watching o3 guess a photo's location is surreal, dystopian and entertaining (712 points | 327 comments)
2. Open-source interactive C tutorial in the browser (22 points | 2 comments)
3. Bare metal printf – C standard library without OS (113 points | 33 comments)
4. Sigbovik Conference Proceedings 2025 [pdf] (37 points | 4 comments)

6. Path is a utility for working with paths (28 points | 8 comments)
7. Show HN: My self-written hobby OS is finally running on my vintage IBM ThinkPad (373 points | 79 comments)
8. Bill Gates's Personal Easter Eggs in 8 Bit BASIC (2008) (78 points | 18 comments)
9. Amazon Just Happens to Hold Book Sale During Independent Bookstore Day (132 points | 91 comments)
10. An end to all this prostate trouble? (550 points | 241 comments)
11. Dad and the Egg Controller (2018) (49 points | 10 comments)
12. IcôNES (21 points | 3 comments)
13. Anatomy of a SQL Engine (40 points | discuss)
14. BART's Anime Mascots (90 points | 37 comments)
15. CONL: "Markdown" for your config files (6 points | 1 comment)
16. Parity (YC S24) is hiring founding engineers to build an AI SRE (in-person, SF) ( | hide)

18. Hundreds of smartphone apps are monitoring users through their microphones (8 points | discuss)

22. CosAE: Learnable Fourier Series for Image Restoration (41 points | 10 comments)
23. Stuffed-Na(a)N: stuff your NaNs (111 points | 47 comments)
24. Mobygratis – Free Moby music to empower your creative projects (213 points | 49 comments)
25. HTTP Feeds: a minimal specification for polling events over HTTP (42 points | 9 comments)
26. Australian who ordered radioactive materials walks away from court (245 points | 269 comments)
27. Tilt: dev environment as code (93 points | 44 comments)
28. LLMs can see and hear without any training (176 points | 61 comments)
29. Your phone isn't secretly listening to you, but the truth is more disturbing (264 points | 220 comments)
30. Solar Orbiter's widest high-res view of the Sun (39 points | 3 comments)
